DOC.brief_summary: Sporadic inclusion body myositis ( sIBM ) rare idiopathic inflammatory myopathy characterize chronic proximal leg distal arm asymmetric muscle weakness . Its prevalence estimate 10 100 case per million , age 50 . Little known natural course disease , delay onset diagnosis , pattern disease management treatment routine practice , well burden patient . The objective PGRx-sIBM study describe : - The epidemiology disease ( estimation prevalence , age onset , delay onset diagnosis , diagnosis process , etc . ) - The pattern disease management treatment routine practice - The burden disease patient informal caregiver , well quality life patient - The burden disease informal caregiver This observational ( non-interventional ) , cross-sectional ( transversal ) study . In recruitment center , least one physician act study investigator , charge identify recruit patient .
